##Questions and Answers



##Code
#Defining function y
```{r}
y<-density(iris$Petal.Width)
```

#Determining class/type/structure
```{r}
class(y)

typeof(y)

str(y)

```


Creating Plot of y

```{r}
#| echo: false
plot(y)
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
